description: a(n) = smallest number > a(n-1) such that a(1)*a(2)*...*a(n) + 1 is prime.
references: H. Dubner, Recursive Prime Generating Sequences, Table 4 pp. 173 Journal of Recreational Mathematics 29(3) 1998 Baywood NY.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..200
mathematica: a[1] = 1; p[1] = 1;a[n_] := a[n] = For[an = a[n-1] + 1, True, an++, pn = p[n-1]*an; If[ PrimeQ[pn+1], p[n] = pn; Return[an] ] ];Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 17 2012 *)Module[{cc={1},k},Do[k=Last[cc]+1;While[!PrimeQ[Times@@Join[cc,{k}]+1], k++];AppendTo[cc,k],{60}];cc] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 21 2013 *)
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jan 25 2002
Definition corrected by T. D. Noe, Feb 14 2007
